notes: Libretro core focusing on Palm m515 with OS 4.1; also available as Qt standalone build
Web-based emulator with iOS App Store native app; supports OS 1-4 (Dragonball) and OS5 (Tungsten E2); browser localStorage for saves
Palm Hardware Emulator M68k; available on Google Play Store; supports up to Palm OS 4.2; sessions stored in phem directory
